page.title: 19RED HOUSE FARM FOOTPATH ROW.
page.content: It was reported in the Leamington Courier on June 14th 1985 that Harry and Diana Johnson, who live in Red House Farm, Offchurch ,had been plagued by hooligans and vandals since they bought the farm 18 months ago. Now Mr. and Mrs.Johnson are trying to divert the path which at present runs across their front lawn. They are not against ramblers or walkers and they don't want to be mean and stop people coming into the countryside, but at the moment they have no privacy at all and suffer continually. Mr Jerome Tucker of the Local Footpath Preservation Group objects to this and said if the path is diverted Leamington would be deprived of one of its best natural assets. Further objections were raised by local people in the following weeks' Courier.
